channel.title: Shoutbox
channel.description: I think we should get a shoutbox, not only would it be a easier way of communication. But it would also cut down on pointless posts, since questions could be awnsered in there as well. We could all talk in there, instead of having to spam posts on topics that later get locked. I think its a good idea, what about you?

item.title: Shoutbox
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“sp11k3t3ht3rd, post:30, topic:409825”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=511098.msg3710156#msg3710156 date=1313290926]
After finally deciding to go onto the IRC, (via the web, I’m just gonna go get a downloadable client to fix this) I get this error:
Starup error: java.lang.Error: Unable to load interface pizz : java.lang.SecurityException: truested loader attempted to load a sandboxed recourse from
[/quote]

Its because you clicked yes on the pop up to BLOCK communications(I forget what it actually says). I just did it as a test because I remember it happening to me but yeah that’s why… Now to figure out how to fix it… lol

EDIT: You just have to wait a little while for the message box to pop back up.

Its this message box:

It’s default set to yes. You have to click no otherwise it gives you that error.[/quote]
:facepalm: Too used to a message poping up asking for permission, not about blocking lol. Never even read that to notice. Works fine

Read full topic

item.title: Shoutbox
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Chat boxes ruin sites and are just building blocks for flame wars and fighting. If you wanna talk to someone more fluently just talk on msn or tell them to meet you in our IRC channel.

Read full topic

[quote=“Javerfire, post:29, topic:409825”]my old forum uses a chat-bar (facebook-like). Mabey that’d work. It runs on the smf buddy system.[/quote]This would be an epic idea. And it would put the buddy list into effect.

Read full topic

item.title: Shoutbox
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:28, topic:409825”]After finally deciding to go onto the IRC, (via the web, I’m just gonna go get a downloadable client to fix this) I get this error:
Starup error: java.lang.Error: Unable to load interface pizz : java.lang.SecurityException: truested loader attempted to load a sandboxed recourse from[/quote]

Its because you clicked yes on the pop up to BLOCK communications(I forget what it actually says). I just did it as a test because I remember it happening to me but yeah that’s why… Now to figure out how to fix it… lol

EDIT: You just have to wait a little while for the message box to pop back up.

Its this message box:

It’s default set to yes. You have to click no otherwise it gives you that error.

Read full topic

item.title: Shoutbox

item.description:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:20, topic:409825”]

IRC is better. Shoutbox will be spammed with server advertisements, and the somewhat inactive mods won’t be there to take care of it.[/quote]
THIS ^ is very true. no arguing with it.

item.title: Shoutbox
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

The Reaper X:

Uh… Wouldn’t that defeat the purpose of the anticipated delayed responses that forums provide? The delay in response provides time for the user to actually think about their response and provide an intelligent reply… Shout boxes lack this feature indefinitely…

The shoutbox doesn’t lack that feature, stupid people lack that feature.

Read full topic

item.title: Shoutbox
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:15, topic:409825”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=511098.msg3708819#msg3708819 date=1313207768]
I do like the SMF2.0 theme, but I would also like another option. I do believe there was a poll and it got quite a lot of votes. If there was going to be a chat box, it sure as hell wouldn’t be XAT. If you guys feel the community wants something then make a poll and moparisthebest will most likely add it if it gets enough votes and isn’t stupid.
[/quote]
ajax irc chatbox![/quote]

looolol

Read full topic

item.title: Shoutbox
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Tom_BETA:

The IRC doesn’t really have much discussion going on, it’s pretty much silence in most channels. Though a shout box would change that, I want another theme option first!

#mopar is fairly active at prime-times.

marcbob:

We will never get a shoutbox because of the IRC but I just don’t like using it. No one is active in it and the feel of it is horrible.

The L&F? use a decent client.

[quote=“marcbob, post:11, topic:409825”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=511098.msg3708801#msg3708801 date=1313206720]
The IRC doesn’t really have much discussion going on, it’s pretty much silence in most channels. Though a shout box would change that, I want another theme option first!
[/quote]

But this theme is so exciting!!! And a chatbox wouldn’t be a horrible thing. People would actually use it. Honestly you could just put in a xat chatbox if you wanted to be lazy and have the mods on there and etc, or you could actually do it right and have a real chatbox that isn’t shit.[/quote]
I love the minimal SMF2.0 theme and xat is the worst thing I’ve ever seen.

Read full topic
